filters.by_vendor_agent: function(doc, req) { if(doc.data && doc.data.vendor == req.userCtx.name) { return true; } return false; }
filters.by_buyer_agent: function(doc, req) { if(doc.data && doc.data.buyer == req.userCtx.name) { return true; } return false; }
filters.personal_record: function(doc, req) { if(doc.data && doc.data.type == 'person' && doc.data.id ==req.userCtx.name) { return true; } return false; }
